title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
**Discover the Magic of Festive Joy with Our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set!**

Embrace the warmth and beauty of the holiday season with our stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Designed to bring a touch of winter magic to your home, whether indoors or outdoors, this set is a must-have for any Christmas celebration.

**Key Features:**

- **Wreath & Garland:** Adorn your spaces with a majestic 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-foot garland, featuring intricate snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches.
  
- **100 LED Warm Lights:** Create a cozy ambiance with 100 high-quality LED warm lights that are battery-operated (3 AA batteries required, not included). Enjoy a gentle, inviting glow with a timer function that automatically turns on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

- **High-Quality Materials:** Crafted from sturdy, hypoallergenic, and fireproof materials, this set is both safe and durable. Itâ€™s designed to last year after year without fading or losing its charm.

- **No Assembly Required:** Simply unpackage and hang, making it incredibly easy to set up and enjoy right away.

- **Versatile Use:** Perfect for a variety of locations, including walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows.

- **Warranty & Support:** Enjoy peace of mind with a 365-day warranty and 24/7 customer service availability, ensuring you get the best care and support.

Transform your home into a winter wonderland this holiday season with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Order now and make every moment magical!
